text: "Sweating Bullets" is a song by Megadeth. Megadeth is an American thrash metal band. The song was released in 1993 as a single. It was the third single from Countdown to Extinction (1992). This is the band's fifth album. A music video for the song was also made. The song went to number 27 on the US Mainstream Rock music chart. It also went to number 26 on UK music charts. The song was written by Dave Mustaine. It is about somebody that has schizophrenia. == Charts == Chart (1993) Peak position European Hot 100 Singles (Music & Media) 87 == References == Category:1992 songs Category:Megadeth songs
title: Sweating Bullets (song)
